list_definition.mean_english: sự khéo léo, sự tinh xảo
list_definition.definition: cleverness at doing something, resulting either from practice or from natural ability

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This job requires a lot of skill.

list_definition.definition: a job or activity that requires training and practice; an art or craft

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the basic skills of reading and writing.
